sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

nubsNob.xcTrails: The upper trails will be groomed this morning and are in great shape today. The lower trails have less snow and will just be packed with a snowmobile. The best skiing is on the upper Red trail today.
nubsNob.comments: If you are debating on coming out to ski today, you should ski. Over 2 inches of heavy snow fell at Nub's yesterday. This snow dried out overnight with the cold temperature and the snow surface feels like mid-winter conditions this morning. The temperature will go above freezing later today and the snow will soften up, but it shouldn't get sticky. Pintail Peak lodge is open with a food and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
